edge: Miss March was offered to Trevor Moore and Zach Cregger by Fox for writing purposes.
Trevor Moore and Zach Cregger wrote and developed Miss March as a writing exercise.
Robert Wagner was originally cast as Hugh Hefner in the movie, but audiences did not react positively during test screenings.
Trevor Moore and Zach Cregger intentionally developed the project without involving Playboy, but took it to Playboy after Robert Wagner's casting did not perform well with audiences.
Hefner liked the movie and agreed to take part, as well as getting 2007 Playmate of the Year Sara Jean Underwood to cameo in the film through his involvement with Playboy.
